text:
I interviewed several maids fr various agencies and found 1 biodata of a maid I liked fr Far East Employment Services.  I hv never heard nor used them before and was very apprehensive abt the 1 star bad review I read fr a guy online 2 yrs ago. When I asked Joey, she said it the employee was no longer with the company.  The agency fee was attractive so I decided to go with them.

The process was smooth, Joey was professional and kept me in the loop abt when my maid was arriving, Quarantine duration, medical etc. I had my helper a week earlier than expected. All good!

I would like to share my recent bad experience on my transferred domestic helper at Far East Employment services at Bukit Timah. The staff that handle my case is not customer centric. Very disappointed in the service.

worst experience ever..didnt even submit our application n lied that she arrived to spore n failed the medical.when our maid didnt even come as her application wasnt submitted..
issue has been raised to MOM and CASE
